distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for PackageKit fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-0217: Check that Finished signal is emitted at most once (bsc#1218544).
- Dropped unnecessary executable permission (bsc#1209138).
notes.title: Description of the patch

PackageKit-1.2.4-150400.3.13.1.x86_64 as component of openSUSE Leap 15.5

notes.text: A use-after-free flaw was found in PackageKitd. In some conditions, the order of cleanup mechanics for a transaction could be impacted. As a result, some memory access could occur on memory regions that were previously freed. Once freed, a memory region can be reused for other allocations and any previously stored data in this memory region is considered lost.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
